title: 問問問問問 help~~~help~~~~~~
author: jstr2916
txt_content:
本帖最后由 jstr2916 于 2012-2-15 18:54 编辑 

minecraft 係5係最多4個mod

我一加多個mod(則5個),就error

replies.author: 路邊電燈泡
replies.txt_content: 那有可能是Mod需求的問題，真的只能裝四個嗎?每個Mod都試過嗎?

replies.author: ayaya
replies.txt_content: 肯定哪个MOD冲突了吧，有位仁兄装了50个

replies.author: jstr2916
replies.txt_content:
我有
ModLoader
AudioMod
mod_Fossil
minecraftforge-client-1.3.2.0
LittleBlocksMod1.10
溫人想辦法orhelp me整個壓縮擋
10金~~~
